translation.en: It's crazy! What do you want me to say?
translation.zh: 这太离谱了！你想让我说什么？

translation.en: I'm trying here, Jo! Just-- You tell me what you need me to say.
translation.zh: 我已经尽力了 乔 那你说我该怎么说

translation.en: The fact that you don't know what to say, that's the problem.
translation.zh: 问题就出在你不知道该说什么

translation.en: You know what it is? They just never liked me.
translation.zh: 你知道吧？ 他们一直就不待见我

translation.en: Really, 'cause your Dad's sitting there offering me wine as if he didn't know.
translation.zh: 是吗？你爸爸坐在那儿 装作不知情地让我喝酒

translation.en: And your Mom's just sittin' on the other side of the table shootin' me dirty looks.
translation.zh: 你妈妈坐在餐桌那头恶狠狠地瞪着我

translation.en: Maybe she was upset because the turkey was getting cold, Ray.
translation.zh: 也许她是因为火鸡变凉了而窝火 雷

translation.en: [Ray] What do I got to do with the turkey?
It took so long for you to get us there.
translation.zh: 我们在路上开了好久才到

translation.en: [Ray] I was driving 55. I drove the speed limit.
translation.zh: 我开的是88公里时速 再快就违规了

translation.en: Is that the problem, Jo? I am a safe driver.
translation.zh: 责任在我吗？我这是注意开车安全

translation.en: Look, why don't we just go home
translation.zh: 这样 不如我们回家后

translation.en: and do Thanksgiving all over again, all right?
translation.zh: 再重新过一次感恩节 好吗？

translation.en: Just the three of us. Our way.
translation.zh: 就我们三个 按我们的方式过

translation.en: We could get pizza. Peri loves pizza.
translation.zh: 我们可以买披萨 佩莉喜欢披萨

translation.en: And then we can be thankful for each other.
translation.zh: 然后我们可以感恩对方

translation.en: We need to stop kidding ourselves, Ray.
translation.zh: 我们不能再自欺欺人了 雷

translation.en: We have been for a long time.
I don't know why you would say that.
I would talk to you about it if we ever actually talked, but we don't.
translation.zh: 我可以和你好好聊 但我们从不沟通

translation.en: I work, and sometimes I just like to... think.
translation.zh: 我有工作 有时候我就是需要…思考

translation.en: But you don't fight for anything anymore. You used to.
translation.zh: 你对什么事都不再争取了 而你以前会

translation.en: Who do you want me to be?
[chuckling sadly] I want you to be yourself.
-The guy that I married six years ago. -[sighs]
translation.zh: 做我六年前嫁给的那个男人

translation.en: The guy that I used to laugh with and-- and-- and dream with and--
translation.zh: 那个曾经和我一起大笑 那个… 曾经和我一起做梦的人 那个…
我还是那个我啊 乔

translation.en: I'm in a patch, and I admit it,
translation.zh: 我承认 我现在正处于低谷
可我是爱你的 好吗？

translation.en: And maybe I should just say it more often, -'cause I love you-- -[horn blaring]
translation.zh: 也许我应该更常这么说 因为我爱你

translation.en: It broke, Mommy, and the songs won't play.
translation.zh: 妈咪 这个坏掉了 放不了音乐了
对 应该是电池的问题

translation.en: You brought extras, right? I told you.
translation.zh: 你有带备用的吧？我让你带上的

translation.en: I left them on the... the counter.
translation.zh: 我把它们忘在柜台上了

translation.en: Daddy will get you some more batteries, all right, sweetie?
translation.zh: 爹地会给你买新电池的 好吗 乖乖？
我们来玩我想你猜的游戏

translation.en: -What do you mean, "blech"? -Why don't we sing a song?
translation.zh: “哎哟”是什么反应？ 不如我们唱歌吧

translation.en: -[Jo] Let's start with one obvious one. -Let's sing a song.
translation.zh: -我们先从最明显的开始 -我们唱歌吧 好吗？
《通通甩掉》 你猜我在想什么

translation.en: Hm. That's a good one too, but I'm thinking more "Sing a Rainbow."
translation.zh: 这首歌不错 不过《唱出一道彩虹》可能更好

translation.en: -Maybe it's gotten a little babyish, Ray. -[Ray] One,
translation.zh: 这可能有点幼稚吧 雷

translation.en: two... ♪ Red and yellow ♪ ♪ And pink and green ♪
translation.zh: 红色 黄色 粉色 绿色

translation.en: -♪ Sing a rainbow for you ♪ -[Peri] ♪ Listen with your eyes ♪
translation.zh: 唱出一道彩虹给你 用你的眼睛倾听
把你所看见的一切都唱出来
和我一起唱出一道彩虹吧

translation.en: -I gotta go. -[Jo] Can you hold it?
translation.zh: 我不行了 能憋得住吗？

translation.en: Okay, I'll pull over at the next rest stop, and then we'll...
translation.zh: 我在下一个休息站停一下 然后我们…

translation.en: [Peri] Mommy, come on! I have to go!
translation.zh: 妈咪 快点 我快不行了

translation.en: Remember, we don't touch anything that we don't have to in there.
translation.zh: 记住 不是必须的东西就别用手碰

translation.en: Can you get me a Coke, please?
-Yeah. -[Jo] I don't know why, but I'm parched.
[Ray] And can I get a four-pack of AA batteries, please?
translation.zh: 能给我一组四块装的五号电池吗？

translation.en: Okay, just... just the coffee and the Coke and the...
translation.zh: 好 那就只要咖啡、可乐 还有…

translation.en: [Peri] Mommy, my compact! Where is it?
translation.zh: 妈咪 我的小镜盒 它去哪儿了？

translation.en: I don't know, why are you asking me, Per?
translation.zh: 不知道 你问我做什么 佩莉？

translation.en: What-- Did you check on the seat under your bum?
translation.zh: 你屁屁下面的座椅检查过了吗？

translation.en: -I had it in the ladies' room, remember? -You check your pocket?
translation.zh: -我去洗手间的时候还在呢 -看看口袋呢？ 你记得吗？

translation.en: [Jo] Okay. Well, I will go check in the ladies' room. But if I find it in there,
translation.zh: 好吧 那我去洗手间看看

translation.en: you don't get to touch it until we get home, okay?
translation.zh: 找到的话 你要回家后才能碰 好吗？

translation.en: Will you check in the back, under the seats?
translation.zh: 你能去后座底下找找吗？
爹地 你检查一下座椅

translation.en: Up, up, up. [grunting] Here we go. I got ya.
translation.zh: 来 我抱你 好的

translation.en: All right. Right, just stay right there. [sighs]
translation.zh: 行了 你就待在这儿

translation.en: Peri, where is the... It's a pigsty back here.
translation.zh: 佩莉 这儿乱得跟猪圈似的

translation.en: Where am I even meant to begin, you know?
translation.zh: 我都不知道从哪儿找起了

translation.en: [sighs] This shi-- This is gonna stain. You know?
translation.zh: 这个会留下印记的 你知道吗？

translation.en: [Ray] What if I wanted to resell this car? Can't even do that.
translation.zh: 万一我想把这辆车转卖了都不行了 这些东西该放哪儿啊 佩莉？

translation.en: I guess this is just the cherry on the cake, this is.
translation.zh: 本来就够糟心了 还给我添乱

translation.en: [Ray] Peri, there's no sign of the thing.
translation.zh: 佩莉 这儿没有镜盒的踪影

translation.en: All right, don't be scared. Just stay right there.
translation.zh: 好 别怕 你就待在那儿

translation.en: Go on. Go on, move. No, no, Peri, not you. J-Just stay there.
translation.zh: 快走开 快点 佩莉 你别动 你就待在原地

translation.en: [man, echoing] Sorry, Mr. Monroe. She's gone.
translation.zh: 很遗憾 门罗先生 她死了

translation.en: Oh, my-- Oh, my God. Baby?
-Joanne, don't move her. -She's okay. She's okay. She's okay.
translation.zh: 乔安妮 你别动她 她没事

translation.en: I'm right here. I'm right here.
Okay. Well, there doesn't seem to be any scratches or bruises.
translation.zh: 那就好 看上去没有什么擦伤或淤青

translation.en: -Ray... -I'm gonna pick you up, all right?
translation.zh: 雷 我抱你起来 好吗？

translation.en: -[groans] Ow! -[Jo] Hold on. What is it? What is it?
-[Peri] My arm, Daddy. It hurts. -This arm?
translation.zh: 我的手臂 爹地 好疼啊
别把我弄疼了 爹地

translation.en: I would never hurt you, sweetie.
translation.zh: 我绝对不会弄疼你 乖乖

translation.en: -[Jo] Gentle, Ray. -[Ray] Okay. It's all right. Up we go.
translation.zh: 轻一点 雷 好 没事 我抱住你了

translation.en: [grunts] Here we go. Daddy's got you.
translation.zh: 很好 爹地抱住你了

translation.en: [Ray] Here we go. Yeah, here we go. Here we are.
translation.zh: 马上就到了 到车上了
不用了 我来开车 雷

translation.en: I saw a hospital sign a few miles back.
translation.zh: 我在路上看过医院的标志 就几公里

translation.en: By the time that ambulance gets here, we'd have gotten her to help.
translation.zh: 我们等救护车的时间都够她看医生了

translation.en: [Jo] We're gonna stay awake until we get to the hospital.
translation.zh: 在到医院之前 你要保持清醒

translation.en: Daddy's gonna get us there real fast. Okay?
translation.zh: 爹地很快就开到了 好吗？
快点啊 雷 快点

translation.en: -[Peri crying] -Oh, come on, come on, come on.
There it is! There it is. There it is.
Nah, I'm gonna carry her. Okay, sweetie.
translation.zh: 不 我抱她去 来吧 乖乖

translation.en: I'll go get us checked in. All right? I won't be long, sweetie.
translation.zh: 那我先去挂号 再等一下就好 乖乖

translation.en: [woman 1] We've been waiting for hours. What's taking so long?
translation.zh: 我们都等了几个钟头了 怎么回事？

translation.en: I'm gonna find someone for you here, right...
translation.zh: 我这就找人来帮你 好吗？

translation.en: This is gonna take a sec.
You should take a seat, make her more comfortable.
translation.zh: 你去坐着 让她舒服些

translation.en: I know. I'll take care of it.
translation.zh: 我知道 我会搞定的

translation.en: [woman 2] So it doesn't matter that the address has changed,
translation.zh: 所以地址有变也无所谓

translation.en: Excuse me. I need a doctor. There's been an accident.
translation.zh: 打扰一下 我需要医生 发生了一起事故

translation.en: -[woman 2] Do you mind? -Take a seat. We'll be with you shortly.
translation.zh: -不许插队 -你先坐下 很快帮你处理
-不 我女儿手臂好像骨折了 -不行！

translation.en: -We think she broke her arm. -Sir, take a seat, and I assure you...
translation.zh: -不 我女儿手臂好像骨折了 -不行！ 你先去坐着 我保证…

translation.en: -She's in a lot of pain! -...we'll get you checked in as soon as possible.
translation.zh: -她很疼！ -我们会尽快帮你处理

translation.en: -Take a seat. -I just need to see someone.

translation.zh: 轮到你的时候再说 拜托了

translation.en: I'm sure it won't be long.

translation.zh: 我听到她的话了 雷

translation.en: I'll be calm when a doctor sees our daughter.
translation.zh: 那得有医生来看我们女儿才行

translation.en: [sniffles] Daddy's gonna take care of us.
What do you want me to do? You want me to kick down the doors
translation.zh: 你想让我怎么着？ 你要我把门踢开 拖个医生出来吗？

translation.en: -and drag a doctor out here? -[Jo] Yes.
translation.zh: 你要我把门踢开 拖个医生出来吗？ 没错

translation.en: How can I help you, sir?
Yeah, I really need to see that doctor, right now.
translation.zh: 我真的需要医生 立刻马上

translation.en: But as I told you before, sir, there are other patients ahead of you.
translation.zh: 先生 我说过 有其他病人排你前面

translation.en: Can you just squeeze us in?
She's sick. She doesn't know what's going on.
translation.zh: 她病了 孩子是无辜的

translation.en: [receptionist] It moves a lot faster if you sign in.
translation.zh: 你登记的话 进度会更快一些

translation.en: Y-You told me to sit down.

translation.zh: 费洛斯先生？ 戴尔费洛斯？

translation.en: Hi, Dale. How are you feeling today?
translation.zh: 你好 戴尔 今天感觉怎么样？

translation.en: [woman 3] He has a sharp pain in his stomach.
Bit of paperwork first, and we'll get him admitted.
translation.zh: 你先填一些资料 我们随后让他住院

translation.en: Would you happen to know what Dale's blood type is?

translation.zh: 又来了一个 大概15岁的样子
跟伯瑟拉姆医生说一下

translation.en: [woman on PA] Dr. Berthram... Dr. Berthram...
Please go back to your seat, sir.
translation.zh: 请回到座位上去 先生

translation.en: I'll let you know when a doctor becomes available.
translation.zh: 有医生有空的时候 我会通知你

translation.en: -We're on the list now. -[Jo] Shh, shh, shh, shh, shh, shh.
I didn't mean to... bite your head off earlier.
translation.zh: 我刚才不是有意要… 冲你发火

translation.en: For getting us here so fast.
translation.zh: 这么快把我们送到医院

translation.en: I just did what needed to be done.
translation.zh: 我只是做了需要做的事
你辜负了你的使命 什么意思？
就是… 和你一起大笑

translation.en: -Thank you. -[man on TV] Who are they?
They are the ones who fight and don't give up,

translation.zh: 保护我们家人安全的人
他们是儿子、丈夫、父亲 我们的英雄

translation.en: [clerk] Can I see your driver's license and insurance card?
translation.zh: 我能看一下你的驾照和保险卡吗？
所有信息都是正确的吗？ 对

translation.en: I work at Craft Home Improvement.
translation.zh: 我在工艺家居公司工作

translation.en: for the kitchen and bathroom design center.
translation.zh: 负责厨房和浴室设计中心

translation.en: Has Peri had any prior surgeries?
translation.zh: 佩莉之前有做过手术吗？

translation.en: Yes. She reacts to penicillin. Her skin breaks out in a rash.
translation.zh: 有 她对青霉素过敏 她的皮肤会起疹子

translation.en: Any history of mental illness in the family?
translation.zh: 有任何家族精神病史吗？

translation.en: I'm a recovering alcoholic. How long is this going to take?
translation.zh: 我正在戒掉酒瘾 就个要花多久？

translation.en: Your insurance records show a prior dependent, Abby Monroe.
translation.zh: 你的保险记录上有之前的附属受保人 叫艾比门罗？
我的第一任妻子去世了

translation.en: Eight years ago. Why is this relevant?
translation.zh: 八年前 这个不相关吧

translation.en: There's just an overlap in your plan that your PPO never fixed.
translation.zh: 你的保险方案有重合 优选医疗机构一直没有修正

translation.en: Were you at the same employer then?
translation.zh: 你当时在同一家公司工作吗？

translation.en: No. I was self-employed and, um...
translation.zh: 不 我那时是个体户 而且…

translation.en: Honestly, how long is this gonna take?
translation.zh: 说真的 这还要多久？

translation.en: Would you like Peri listed for organ donation?
translation.zh: 你希望佩莉被列入器官捐献名单吗？

translation.en: Can I convince you to reconsider?
translation.zh: 我能说服你重新考虑吗？

translation.en: The number of children on the transplant list is--
translation.zh: 在等待器官移植的儿童数量…

translation.en: What is your daughter's blood type?
That's all right. We can crossmatch later if necessary.
translation.zh: 没关系 我们可以必要时再进行交叉配血

translation.en: -Why would that be necessary? -[clerk] Last one.
The state requires me to ask if everything is safe in the household.
translation.zh: 州法律要求我询问家中一切是否安全

translation.en: With these types of injuries, sir, I am mandated by law.
translation.zh: 先生 鉴于这类受伤 我这是依法办事

translation.en: Okay, but this was an accident at a construction site.
translation.zh: 行 但这是发生在建筑工地的事故

translation.en: [Jo] Ray... Yes, we're safe. Our household...
translation.zh: 别说了 雷 对 我们是安全的 我们的家庭环境…

translation.en: I'll get a nurse to take you back. Oh.
translation.zh: 我会叫护士带你们进去 哦

translation.en: Sir, it looks like we don't take your type of medical insurance here.
translation.zh: 先生 看来我们这里 不接受你这类医疗保险

translation.en: If you call your provider, they can give you a list of qualified--
translation.zh: 你可以找保险公司要一份 指定医院名单…

translation.en: A list? I don't need a list. I need a doctor.
translation.zh: 名单？我不需要名单 我需要医生

translation.en: This hospital's admission policy requires proof of coverage.
translation.zh: 本医院的住院政策要求承保证明

translation.en: Whatever it takes, I'll cover it. Okay?
translation.zh: 不管多少钱 我自掏腰包

translation.en: You do take cash here? You got an ATM?
translation.zh: 行吗？你们收现金吗？有提款机吗？

translation.en: I can't believe this, can you?
translation.zh: 这太难以置信了 对吧？

translation.en: She's sitting there going... [imitates keyboard clacking]
translation.zh: 她就坐在那儿问个不停

translation.en: -He doesn't have... -[Peri] Did you find my compact?
translation.zh: 他没有… 你找到我的小镜盒了吗？

translation.en: [Jo] We didn't, sweetheart, but I'm gonna buy you another one soon.
translation.zh: 没有 乖乖 我再给你买一个 好吗？

translation.en: [clerk] Everything's fine, Mr. Monroe. -You're good to go. -Fantastic.
translation.zh: 没事了 门罗先生 你们可以就诊了

translation.en: [clerk] Nurse Anne will get you situated.
translation.zh: 安妮护士会带你们过去

translation.en: -We'll get you taken care of right away. -[clerk] Yes, another one.
translation.zh: 我们会马上为你诊治 对 又来了一个

translation.en: -[Jo] Come on, baby. -[Anne] Sit in the wheelchair for me?
translation.zh: 麻烦你坐上轮椅 好吗？

translation.en: A walk-in. Six-year-old female, unknown blood type.
translation.zh: 没有预约 六岁女童  血型未知
跟伯瑟拉姆医生说一下

translation.en: [Anne] Kirkbride serves three counties, so it can get quite busy.
translation.zh: 我们医院服务于三个郡 所以有时非常繁忙

translation.en: And EMS just brought in a couple of head traumas
translation.zh: 救护车刚送来两个头部受创患者

translation.en: -so it's backed us up a bit. -Yeah, I saw that. What happened?
translation.zh: 所以进度有点缓慢 我刚看到了 怎么回事？

translation.en: A couple of teenagers. Head-on collision. It was a drunk driver.
translation.zh: 是两个青少年 迎面相撞 司机酒驾了
真糟糕 他们还好吗？

translation.en: [Anne] As I understand it, it's touch-and-go.
translation.zh: 据我所知 现在很难说

translation.en: -[groans] -[woman] Do you have to do that? He's in a lot of pain.
translation.zh: 你非得这样吗？他很疼的

translation.en: I just need to know where he's hurting, okay?
translation.zh: 我得找出他是哪里疼 好吗？

translation.en: [Anne] Okay, sweetheart. There you are. Okay.
translation.zh: 好了 宝贝 坐上来吧 好的
沃尔克医生 请到9号病房 宝贝 你把手臂放在大腿上 靠着枕头

translation.en: Hey, just keep that arm in your lap, lay back on the pillow.
translation.zh: 宝贝 你把手臂放在大腿上 靠着枕头
马上就好了 最好是

translation.en: or I'm gonna break somebody's arm.
translation.zh: 不然我得把别人的手臂掰断
你们好 我是伯瑟拉姆医生
很抱歉 我不是有意…

translation.en: No, no, no, it's quite all right.
Sometimes I've gotta crack a few heads myself around here
translation.zh: 有时候 我在这儿 也得猛敲几个脑袋才能做成事
我在这儿 也得猛敲几个脑袋才能做成事

translation.en: what can we do for ya?

translation.zh: 是门罗 我叫佩莉门罗

translation.en: Oh! Yes. I see it now.
translation.zh: 哦！是哦 我这下看清楚了
没错 佩莉 佩戴的佩 茉莉的莉？
全名是佩莉温可 玉黍螺的意思
那是我妈妈最喜欢的海螺

translation.en: [chuckles] Okay, sweetheart. Let's let the nice doctor do his job.
translation.zh: 好了 乖乖 让这位好医生工作吧

translation.en: It's all right, I'm not that nice.
translation.zh: 没关系 我人也没那么好
哦 天啊 这样啊

translation.en: Well, sooner or later, everybody does.
translation.zh: 这种事每个人迟早都会碰到

translation.en: So, Peri, I'm gonna see how that arm is doing,
translation.zh: 好 佩莉 我要检查一下你的手臂

translation.en: I want you to let me know. Deal?
translation.zh: 你都得告诉我 好吗？

translation.en: -It's a gas station a few miles from here. -[Jo] We're on our way to Minneapolis.
translation.zh: 离这儿几公里远的加油站 我们在去明尼阿波利斯的路上

translation.en: Visiting Grandma and Grandpa for Thanksgiving, I bet.
translation.zh: 一定是去和爷爷奶奶过感恩节了吧？

translation.en: -All right, so you were at a gas station? -[Ray] Yup.
translation.zh: 好 你说你们当时在加油站？ 对

translation.en: Uh, there was a dog, and it scared her.
translation.zh: 那儿有条狗 她被吓到了

translation.en: Uh, it was just an accident.
You didn't say anything about a dog.
[Berthram] Did that hurt when I touched here?
-Yeah, I know, sweetie. That's an ouchie. -Uh, it doesn't matter, she just fell.
translation.zh: 我知道 乖乖 这里痛痛 那不重要 她就是摔下去了

translation.en: And I nearly had you, didn't I?
translation.zh: 而且我差点就抓住你了 对吧？
乖乖 你摔下去的时候

translation.en: did you hit your head, Peri? You did?
translation.zh: 你有撞到头吗 佩莉？ 有 是吧？

translation.en: You know, you are a real trooper.
translation.zh: 听我说 你非常勇敢

translation.en: I think the swelling is consistent with a fracture along the distal radius,
translation.zh: 我认为肿胀现象 符合桡骨远端骨折的症状

translation.en: but we'll get an-- we'll get an X-ray to confirm that.
translation.zh: 但是我们要拍X光片来证实

translation.en: -[Jo] She need a cast? -We're going to put her in...
-[whispering] You're a brave girl. Yeah. -[Berthram speaking indistinctly]
translation.zh: -我们会送她去… -你是个勇敢的姑娘 真的

translation.en: I don't think they're gonna have to amputate.
translation.zh: 但他们恐怕得给你截肢

translation.en: this arm is gonna be as good as new.
translation.zh: 你的这只手臂 会像过去一样完好如初

translation.en: Now, look at my shoulder. Peri, look at my shoulder.
translation.zh: 现在看向我的肩膀 佩莉 看我肩膀

translation.en: Most beautiful eyes I've ever seen.
translation.zh: 这是我见过的最美的眼睛

translation.en: Now, Peri, Nurse Anne is gonna come and give you some medicine for the pain.
translation.zh: 好了 佩莉 安妮护士会给你拿止痛药

translation.en: I gotta talk to Mommy and Daddy here for a minute.
translation.zh: 我要和你的妈咪和爹地谈一会儿
开点布洛芬 麻烦检查她的生命体征

translation.en: [Berthram] I'm concerned about a possible head injury.
translation.zh: 我担心她头部可能有损伤 天啊

translation.en: It's just I'm not seeing the pupil dilation that I like.
translation.zh: 只是我没有看到瞳孔扩张的理想状态

translation.en: I'd like to do a CAT scan just to rule out anything internal.
translation.zh: 我想做个断层扫描 排除任何内部损伤

translation.en: And I would agree with you,
but on the off chance that it's bleeding around the brain,
translation.zh: 但是万一她大脑周围有出血

translation.en: what we would call a subdural hematoma,
now that can be quite serious.
A head injury like that could lead to confusion, seizures,
translation.zh: 这种头部损伤可能导致神志不清 癫痫发作

translation.en: even the possibility of slipping into a coma.
[Jo] We've-- We've heard enough. Do it.
translation.zh: 别再往下说了 做检查吧

translation.en: [Berthram] Yeah, but you need to know... it is a costly procedure.
translation.zh: 好 但你们得知道 检查费用十分高昂

translation.en: I would do anything for my family, so you do what you have to do.
translation.zh: 我愿意为我的家人做任何事 所以你就做你该做的吧

translation.en: You know, that's a pretty nasty little scrape you have yourself.
translation.zh: 我说 你脸上的擦伤也挺严重的

translation.en: -Should I take a look? -It's nothin'. I'm a tough guy.
translation.zh: 要我帮你看看吗？ 没事 我是男子汉

translation.en: [Berthram] Okay, well, give me a minute to get things in motion for Peri.
translation.zh: 行 给我点时间给佩莉安排检查

translation.en: [Ray] Yeah. Yeah, you heard him. It's nothing.
translation.zh: 对 你也听到了 没什么事

translation.en: It's just a precaution. It's better to be safe, right?
translation.zh: 这只是以防万一 谨慎一点总是好的

translation.en: This goes over your head right here.
We're almost done, and we get to go home soon.
translation.zh: 就快好了 我们很快就能回家了

translation.en: He's going down to the lower level for an appendectomy.
translation.zh: 把他推到楼下去 做阑尾切除

translation.en: -[Jo] It looks like you're feeling better. -[Peri giggles]
Hey, maybe we should get a motel like the old days
translation.zh: 不如我们像以前那样找个汽车旅馆吧

translation.en: and pick up the drive tomorrow.
That's the best idea I've heard all day.
translation.zh: 这是我今天听到的最棒的点子

translation.en: Maybe they have a hot tub.
[orderly] Hello, Peri. Nurse Anne and I got this for you
translation.zh: 你好 佩莉 这是我和安妮护士的一点心意

translation.en: for being the number one patient of the day.
translation.zh: 因为你是今天最棒的患者

translation.en: [Jo] Oh! Ah, look at that. Thank you. That's so sweet.
translation.zh: 多可爱啊 谢谢你们 真是贴心

translation.en: -[toy] I hope you feel better. -I'm Bruce.
translation.zh: 祝你早日康复 我是布鲁斯

translation.en: And I'm gonna take you downstairs
so we can take a little peek inside that little noggin of yours. Okay?
translation.zh: 好让我们看看你的小脑袋 好吗？

translation.en: You know, you must have made quite an impression on Dr. Berthram.
translation.zh: 我说 伯瑟拉姆医生一定很喜欢你

translation.en: He does not crack a smile for just anybody.
translation.zh: 他可不会轻易对别人笑
是啊 她可有魅力了

translation.en: Dad here must have to keep a shotgun handy
translation.zh: 你爸爸得随身带着猎枪 才能把男孩子们全赶走 对吧？

translation.en: to chase off all the boys, am I right? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 才能把男孩子们全赶走 对吧？

translation.en: All right, keep your arms and legs inside the vehicle.
translation.zh: 好了 手和脚都不要伸到外面哦

translation.en: So, this is a... a more restricted part of the hospital.
translation.zh: 这里呢 是医院限制比较严格的区域

translation.en: I can only take one visitor down with a patient to the lower level.
translation.zh: 我只能让一位访客跟随患者下楼去

translation.en: Hey. I'm gonna wait right here for you when you get out.
translation.zh: 听着 我就在这里等你出来

translation.en: Actually, you might want to wait out front.
translation.zh: 其实你在大厅等会比较好

translation.en: Yeah, scans can take a while, especially if they're backed up.
translation.zh: 扫描要一阵子 尤其在病人多的时候

translation.en: [Peri] Daddy, can I have a pizza?
translation.zh: 爹地 我能吃披萨吗？

translation.en: Okay. Okay, okay. We'll see you in a few.
translation.zh: 行了 我们一会儿见

translation.en: How about next year, we stay home?
translation.zh: 不如明年就在家里待着吧
喂 伙计 你没事吧？

translation.en: You were talkin' in your sleep.
[man on TV] Well, suppose somebody came along and offered you a million dollars for your life.
translation.zh: 假设有人愿意出一百万美元换你的命

translation.en: Would you take it? John, don't even talk like that.
translation.zh: 你会接受吗？ 约翰 你别这么说

translation.en: Do you mean I'll be... dead?
[man] Your life is worth more than a million dollars,
translation.zh: 你的命比一百万美元更值钱

translation.en: so don't bet it on getting around in a car in order to save a couple of minutes.
translation.zh: 所以不要为了节省几分钟鲁莽超车

translation.en: The stakes are too high for what you can possibly get out of it.
translation.zh: 你付出的代价会远远超出你的所得

translation.en: -[woman 1 sighs] It still hurts. -[woman 2] Excuse me.
translation.zh: 还疼着呢 你好 我的孩子好像感染了之类的

translation.en: I think my baby has an infection or something. He won't stop crying.
translation.zh: 你好 我的孩子好像感染了之类的 他一直哭个不停

translation.en: [receptionist] Okay, how long has that been going on for?
translation.zh: 这样啊 症状持续多久了？

translation.en: Okay, um, well, I'm gonna get you to sign this form.
translation.zh: 好的 你需要在这张表上签字

translation.en: If you'll just take a seat, sir. Thank you.
translation.zh: 先生 请你坐下等待  谢谢

translation.en: Do you know how much longer it's gonna be?
Sir, I'm gonna need a little more information than that.
translation.zh: 先生 麻烦你再说具体一点

translation.en: My daughter, Peri Monroe, she went for a CAT scan with my wife.
translation.zh: 我女儿叫佩莉门罗 我妻子陪她去做断层扫描了

translation.en: [receptionist] Okay, so she checked in before? Yeah.
All right, morning shift would have taken care of that.
translation.zh: 好的 这应该是值早班的人负责的

translation.en: I don't have the imaging schedule, but it can take a little while.
translation.zh: 我没有时间表 但扫描一般都有点久

translation.en: Yeah. They told me that, I just...
translation.zh: 对 他们是这么说的 只是…

translation.en: You know, I know my kid. She's gonna be hungry
translation.zh: 以我对我孩子的了解 她会饿肚子

translation.en: I just wanna check on her.
translation.zh: 我就是想看看她的情况

translation.en: As I said, sir, I don't have that information here.
translation.zh: 先生 我说过了 我没有这方面的信息

translation.en: And if you just take a seat, I'm sure she'll be out shortly.
translation.zh: 你先坐下等待 她一定很快就出来了

translation.en: I'd like to speak with Dr. Berthram.
translation.zh: 我想找一下伯瑟拉姆医生

translation.en: Dr. Berthram has left for the day.
translation.zh: 伯瑟拉姆医生已经下班了

translation.en: but he would have passed his cases to the other doctor on duty.
translation.zh: 但他会把病例交给另一位值班医生

translation.en: I can have the nurse's station pass along a message to the on-duty,
translation.zh: 我可以让护士站给值班医生传个话

translation.en: If you'll just give me a moment.
[man 2] I lived it again and again, like in slow motion...
translation.zh: 我回想了一遍又一遍 就像慢镜头

translation.en: [woman] It's enough to drive you nuts, isn't it?
translation.zh: 人都快发疯了 对吧？

translation.en: The wait. I've seen you sitting over there.
translation.zh: 这么等下去 我看过你坐在那边

translation.en: My husband went in at 6:00 a.m.
translation.zh: 我丈夫是早上6点进去的
现在都… 快该吃晚饭了

translation.en: -[elevator bell dings] -[woman] Hurry up and pay.
Sometimes they hope we all just die in the meantime.
translation.zh: 有时候他们巴不得我们就死在这儿

translation.en: Uh, what are you in for?
Hi, how may I help you?
Oh, right, yes. I did leave word, sir, but I haven't heard back yet.
translation.zh: 哦 是的 我传过话了 先生  但我还收到回话

translation.en: Can you check again now, please?
translation.zh: 你能再查看一次吗？拜托了

translation.en: Okay, what was her name again?
translation.zh: 好吧 再说一下她的名字
门罗 是我们的们吗？
不 大门的门 姓罗的罗

translation.en: Okay, I have several Monroes here, but I'm not seeing a Peri Monroe.
translation.zh: 好 这儿有几个门罗 但没有佩莉门罗

translation.en: [receptionist] Could she be under another name?
I signed in. I signed in on the clipboard, right?
translation.zh: 我登了记的 就在写字板上 就在…

translation.en: [receptionist] Yeah, but that gets thrown out
translation.zh: 是没错 但登记表会在换班时被扔掉

translation.en: at the end of each shift. It would all be in the system by now,
translation.zh: 是没错 但登记表会在换班时被扔掉 现在应该录入系统了

translation.en: but I'm not seeing a "Peri Monroe."

translation.zh: 这不可能 我们办了住院手续

translation.en: You know, you asked us for all this information.
translation.zh: 你们还问了一大堆问题

translation.en: Yes, but the patient's file is always under the patient's name,
translation.zh: 是 但是患者的档案肯定在患者名下

translation.en: and I'm not seeing a "Peri Monroe."
She is a patient. She's a patient of Dr. Berthram's.
translation.zh: 她是患者 是伯瑟拉姆医生的患者

translation.en: -Yeah, he saw her. -Dr. Berthram has left for the evening.
translation.zh: 是他给她看的诊 伯瑟拉姆医生已经下班了

translation.en: Yeah, I know that! You told me that!
translation.zh: 这我知道 你已经说过了

translation.en: Sir, there's no need... to raise your voice.
translation.zh: 先生 你无需对我大呼小叫

translation.en: Check again. When we came in, in late morning, we did all this,
translation.zh: 你再看看 我们上午来的时候 走了全套流程

translation.en: and then they took her down to the CAT scan.
translation.zh: 然后他们带她下楼去做断层扫描

translation.en: Okay, maybe they put it under your insurance number.
translation.zh: 好吧 也许是用你的保险号登记的

translation.en: You wouldn't take my insurance. You said that I could pay cash.
translation.zh: 你们不接受我的保险 还说可以付现

translation.en: The woman who admitted us, she asked. They said it was fine.
translation.zh: 给我们办手续的女人问过了 她说行

translation.en: I've just never heard it being done that way before.
translation.zh: 我从来没听说过这种情况

translation.en: Yeah, I don't care about that because I don't make the rules. All right?
translation.zh: 这不关我的事 规矩又不是我定的 对吧？

translation.en: Let's ask her. Let's ask the woman that checked us in.
translation.zh: 我们去问她 问那个做登记的女人

translation.en: Then let's ask the ER, all right?
translation.zh: 那我们去问急诊室的人 好吗？

translation.en: Because there was a nurse named Anne, there was an orderly, his name was Bruce.
translation.zh: 有个护士叫安妮 有个护工叫布鲁斯

translation.en: There's been a full shift rotation.
I just want to see my wife and daughter, and they're back there.
translation.zh: 我只想看到我的妻子和女儿 她们就在后面

translation.en: Unless I can identify you with a patient, I--
translation.zh: 除非我能查到患者档案 我…

translation.en: and I just need you to call down to where they do the CAT scans
translation.zh: 我只需要你打给做断层扫描的地方

translation.en: and see if there's a woman and a six-year-old kid still there,
translation.zh: 看那儿有没有一个女人和六岁的孩子

translation.en: and whether they're waiting, or if they want to come home.
translation.zh: 问她们是继续等待 还是想先回家

translation.en: Hi, this is the main desk.
You better stop, or I'll make you live up to that.
translation.zh: 你最好别说了 不然我让你有的受

translation.en: Um, anyway, I'm just calling about a little girl.
translation.zh: 行了 我打来是想找一个小女孩

translation.en: I know, I know, but can you check for me, please?
translation.zh: 这我明白 能麻烦你看一眼吗？

translation.en: I'm sorry, sir, there hasn't been a scan since nine o'clock this morning,
translation.zh: 抱歉 先生 最后一次扫描是早上9点

translation.en: and it was for a 62-year-old woman's hip.
translation.zh: 是一位62岁女性的髋部扫描

translation.en: So what are you telling me?

translation.zh: 对不起 她们不在这里

translation.en: What? What? You lost my family?
translation.zh: 什么？你们把我的家人弄丢了？

translation.en: Maybe you're at the wrong hospital.
translation.zh: 也许你们去的是别家医院？

translation.en: I've been sitting there all day.
[receptionist] Maybe they left before you got here.
Why would they do that? Why would they do that?
-We came together. -I'm sorry, sir. Sir! They're not here.
translation.zh: -我们一起来的 -抱歉 先生 她们不在这儿

translation.en: so I can deal with the gentleman behind you?
translation.zh: 你后面还有一位先生在排队

translation.en: -What are you saying? -[receptionist] Hi, how may I help you?
translation.zh: 你这是什么意思？ 你好 请问有什么事？

translation.en: [man] My wife's been sitting over there for two hours.
translation.zh: 我老婆已经在那边坐了两个钟头了

translation.en: Uh, excuse me, sir! You can't go back there!
translation.zh: 不好意思 先生  你不能进去

translation.en: Drew, that man, he shouldn't be back there.
translation.zh: 德鲁 那个男人不能闯进里面

translation.en: What the hell? Do you mind?
-I'm so sorry, I'm just looking for-- -[Drew] Hey!
translation.zh: 很抱歉 我是在… -找我的… -喂！

translation.en: -You're not supposed to be back here. -Okay. Okay. Okay.
translation.zh: 你不能擅自闯入这里 我知道

translation.en: -Drew, what's going on? -This guy just rushed in from up front.
translation.zh: 德鲁 怎么回事？ 这人从大厅闯进来了

translation.en: Just... uh, my family's back here. The receptionist, she wouldn't--
translation.zh: 我的家人在这里面 前台的人不…

translation.en: I don't give a shit, pal. Just calm down.
translation.zh: 这关我屁事 伙计 你冷静点

translation.en: I'm just looking for my wife and daughter. Joanne and Peri Monroe.
translation.zh: 我在找我的妻子和女儿 乔安妮和佩莉门罗

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, yeah. My daughter is. That's what I'm trying to explain.
translation.zh: 对 我女儿是 我正要解释呢

translation.en: All right, all right, let's all just take it easy. Okay?
translation.zh: 好 你别急 慢慢说 好吗？
我是路卡多医生 你呢？

translation.en: why don't you tell me what all this fuss is about.
translation.zh: 你跟我说说你为什么要在这里大闹

translation.en: Well, we came in earlier, and my daughter saw Dr. Berthram, he--
translation.zh: 我们是早些时候来的 伯瑟拉姆医生接诊了我女儿 他…

translation.en: -She had a potentially fractured arm. -[Lucado] Okay, was she released?
translation.zh: 她的手臂好像骨折了 好 她出院了吗？

translation.en: No, no, no. She-- He was worried about a head injury.
translation.zh: 没有 她… 他担心可能有头部损伤

translation.en: He took her to the CAT scan. Joanne went with her.
translation.zh: 带她去做断层扫描 乔安妮也去了

translation.en: -That's the last time I saw her. -This was when?
translation.zh: -就没有下文了 -什么时候的事？
门罗？ 大门的门 姓罗的罗

translation.en: Got the whole day in front of me here, and I'm not finding any Monroe.
translation.zh: 我这儿有今天全天的记录 没有一个叫门罗的

translation.en: Well, that's insane 'cause, you know, we were here.
translation.zh: 这太离谱了 是这样 我们来过这里 我们当时…
我们来过这里 我们当时… 就在那边

translation.en: -[Anne] All right... -So was she. So was she.
She... She knows me. She helped us. Ask her! Ask her!
translation.zh: 她当时也在 她见过我 她帮助了我们 不信你问她！

translation.en: [Lucado] Okay. Just calm down. Anne, can I see you for a second?
translation.zh: 好 你冷静 安妮 你能过来一下吗？

translation.en: -He was here on my earlier shift. -See?
translation.zh: -我值上一班的时候来的 -我说吧

translation.en: He was treated for a head injury.
translation.zh: 他因为头部损伤接受了治疗

translation.en: That is a pretty nasty contusion you have there.
translation.zh: 你头上那挫伤是挺严重

translation.en: -[Lucado] Ray, I need you to calm down. -[mutters] Just leave me alone.
translation.zh: 雷 你需要冷静 你根本不认识我 别碰我

translation.en: You don't even know me. What have you done to my family?
translation.zh: 你压根儿不认识我 你们拿我家人怎么样了？
我妻子在哪儿？ 你给我冷静！

translation.en: [Lucado] We cannot have you disrupting this hospital.
translation.zh: 我们不能任由你扰乱医院秩序

translation.en: -Hold him in four. I'll call upstairs. -[Ray groans]
translation.zh: 把他关进4号房 我给楼上打电话

translation.en: -Get up on there. -[Ray] Get off me. Get off.
Give me your hand. Give me your hand!
Please, please. You don't need them.
translation.zh: 拜托 你不用给我铐上

translation.en: I'm sorry. It's just-- Just a little confused, is all.
translation.zh: 对不起 我只是… 我只是有点懵了

translation.en: You're gonna be locked up in here until the doctor can figure out what you need, okay?
translation.zh: 在医生想出对策前 你会被关在这里

translation.en: -[Ray sighs] -Lay down, let the sedative do its work.
translation.zh: 躺下吧 让镇静剂发挥效用

translation.en: [under breath] Yeah, yeah, yeah. Come on.
Hey. You remember me? -You remember my daughter, Peri Monroe? -[knocking on door]
translation.zh: 喂 你记得我吗？我女儿佩莉门罗？

translation.en: [Bruce] Your dad must have to keep a shotgun handy
translation.zh: 你爸爸得随身带着猎枪

translation.en: to chase off all the boys, am I right?
translation.zh: 才能把男孩子们全赶走 对吧？

translation.en: Get out of the way! Get out of the way!
-[feedback whines on radio] -Yeah, Frank, he got away.
translation.zh: 喂 弗兰克 他跑走了

translation.en: All right, what do you want me to do?
translation.zh: 这样啊 你想让我怎么做？

translation.en: Let reception know in case he thinks he's comin' back.
translation.zh: 跟前台说一声 以防他以为他还能回去

translation.en: [woman on radio] We had a noise complaint. Two white males in a vacant lot.
translation.zh: 我们收到噪音投诉 两个白人男子好像在空地上嗑药

translation.en: Looks like they may be getting high--
translation.zh: 两个白人男子好像在空地上嗑药

translation.en: -Hey! Stop! -[officer 1] Oh, Jesus. What the fuck?
translation.zh: -停车！ -天啊 这他妈搞什么？

translation.en: Help me! They've taken my family!
translation.zh: 帮帮我 他们带走了我的家人

translation.en: They just took 'em, just took my family. They won't let me see them.
translation.zh: 就这么把我的家人带走了 还不让我见她们

translation.en: Then they gave me this shot and this drug, and they kind of knocked me out.
translation.zh: 他们给我打了一针药剂 我有点晕乎

translation.en: -[officer 2] Relax. -Maybe they gave the same thing
to my wife, 'cause I don't know what's happening.
translation.zh: 我不知道这是怎么回事

translation.en: -[Ray] I... I'm calm. I'm calm. -What are you talkin' about?
translation.zh: 我很冷静 你在说什么呢？

translation.en: [panting] She's... My daughter's in there, and she's only six.
translation.zh: 我女儿在那里面 她只有六岁
这和争夺抚养权有关吗？

translation.en: No. We came here to get help, and now they're saying that she didn't--
translation.zh: 不 我们来这里看病 现在他们却说她没…

translation.en: That she she never came here.

translation.zh: 懂我意思吗？他们做了什么

translation.en: They've done something, and they're trying to cover it up.
translation.zh: 他们做了什么 还想掩盖事实

translation.en: This? They locked me in a room. I had to break out.
translation.zh: 这个吗？ 他们把我关起来了 我只能强行出逃

translation.en: -All right. Can I see some ID, please? -[Ray] Yeah.
translation.zh: 我能看一下你的证件吗？ 好

translation.en: Here. That's them. That's them. That's my wife.
translation.zh: 这是她们的照片 这是我妻子

translation.en: We were-- It was Thanksgiving. We were just going home,
translation.zh: 我们… 刚过了感恩节 正在回家的路上

translation.en: and we stopped at this gas station,
translation.zh: 我们在一个加油站停了一下

translation.en: and she falls over, she hurts herself, and that's why we came here.
translation.zh: 她摔了一跤 受伤了 所以我们才会来到这里

translation.en: That's why I know they're still in there.
translation.zh: 所以我才确定她们还在里面

translation.en: Why don't we go inside and see if we can sort this out?
translation.zh: 我们进去吧 看能不能弄清情况

translation.en: Send somebody over here now. It's him.
translation.zh: 现在就派人过来 他又来了

translation.en: Hey, we just dropped off that OD.
translation.zh: 你好 服药过量的报案解决了

translation.en: [receptionist] Yes, what can I do for you?
translation.zh: 好的 请问有什么事？

translation.en: Okay, so, now we have this man here
translation.zh: 是这样 这位先生说

translation.en: who says that you all are holding his family against their will.
translation.zh: 是这样 这位先生说 你们强行扣留了他的家人

translation.en: -You stay away from me. -[receptionist] That's ridiculous.
translation.zh: 你离我远点 -这太荒唐了 -就是这个家伙

translation.en: That's the one that put me in the room, and he held me against my will.
translation.zh: 就是他把我关进了房间 强行扣留我
你认识这个人吗？ 认识

translation.en: All right, well, he's saying that you roughed him up
translation.zh: 是这样 他说你有对他动粗

translation.en: -and that you injected him with drugs. -Yep.
No, he was in earlier and acting a fool, so the on-call doc gave him a sedative.
translation.zh: 不 是他之前胡闹 值班医生才给他打了镇静剂

translation.en: I'm not lying. Why aren't you arresting his ass?
translation.zh: -你骗人 -我没有骗人 你们怎么不逮捕他呢？

translation.en: [officer 2] Calm down. Let us handle this.
translation.zh: 你冷静一下 这事让我们来处理

translation.en: Now, where did you last see your wife and daughter?
translation.zh: 你最后一次 见到你妻子和女儿是在哪里？

translation.en: It was in the emergency ward, it was ward nine.
It was just through those doors.
I can't believe you guys are buying into this bullshit.
translation.zh: 你们竟然信了他的鬼话

translation.en: I mean, he's a fuckin' head case! Look at him.
translation.zh: 这货就他妈是个疯子！瞧他那样儿

translation.en: Want to take us to ward nine...
Now, your chest X-rays show a slight infiltration
translation.zh: 你的胸部X光片显示有轻微滤过

translation.en: in the right lower front lobe of your lungs--
Now do you want to tell me where my wife and daughter are?
translation.zh: 现在你能告诉我 我妻子和女儿的下落了吧？

translation.en: -They should've locked you up! -We'll handle this.
translation.zh: 该被关起来的是你！ 我们自会处理

translation.en: Can you answer this man's question?
translation.zh: 你能回答这位先生的问题吗？

translation.en: He says that his wife and daughter are missing in the hospital.
translation.zh: 他说他的妻子和女儿在医院里失踪了

translation.en: The answer is, I don't know.
According to our nursing staff, Mr. Monroe came in alone,
translation.zh: 根据我们的护士 门罗先生是一个人来的

translation.en: -wishing to be seen for a head injury. -Peri was admitted.
translation.zh: 希望能医治他的头部损伤 佩莉住了院

translation.en: Where's her file? Where's her file?
Can we take this to my office, please?
translation.zh: 我们能去我办公室聊吗？

translation.en: Gotta be a record somewhere, right? For patients admitted.
translation.zh: 总得有记录 对吧？ 患者住院的纪录
有的时候 文件可能被不当归置

translation.en: or they get filed under the wrong name. Maybe it wasn't entered into the system.
translation.zh: 或者以错误的姓名归档 也许没有被录入系统

translation.en: You should call that Dr. Berthram, all right?
translation.zh: 你应该打给伯瑟拉姆医生 好吧？

translation.en: He sent Peri to get the CAT scan, and that was the last time I saw him.
translation.zh: 他让佩莉去做断层扫描 我就再也没见过她

translation.en: He went off call. He's probably at home.
translation.zh: 他下班了 应该在家吧

translation.en: Well, if he can sort this out,
translation.zh: 如果他能解决这个问题

translation.en: it's probably worth giving him a call, right?
translation.zh: 或许你应该打给他 对吧？

translation.en: [officer 1] Where do you do the CAT scans?
Um... our imaging lab's on the third floor.
translation.zh: 我们的影像实验室在三楼

translation.en: [officer 1] Okay. Take us up there please.
translation.zh: 好 麻烦你带我们上楼

translation.en: -No, our imaging lab's on the third floor. -[Ray] No, no, no.
translation.zh: -不 我们的影像实验室在三楼 -不对

translation.en: No, I saw them get in an elevator and go down.
translation.zh: 不对 我看着他们进的电梯 然后下了楼

translation.en: He's obviously confused. Our lab is on three.
translation.zh: 他明显是糊涂了 我们的实验室在三楼

translation.en: Can you take us up there, please?
translation.zh: 能麻烦你带我们上去吗？

translation.en: [Lucado] This computer keeps a log of usage.
translation.zh: 这台计算机会记录使用情况
有日期、时间和持续时间

translation.en: You can see this machine was used at 9:07 a.m.
translation.zh: 你可以看到这台机器的使用时间是 早上9点07分

translation.en: for a duration lasting exactly 29 minutes.
And that was the last time.
Can you see this clearly, Mr. Monroe?
translation.zh: 门罗先生 你能看清楚吗？
能 但这证明不了什么

translation.en: It proves no one had a scan at the time you say your daughter was here.
translation.zh: 这证明在你说你女儿在的期间 并没有人做过扫描

translation.en: Yeah, she wasn't here, because they never brought her here.
translation.zh: 她没来过 是因为他们根本没带她过来

translation.en: She didn't have a CAT scan. They just took her somewhere else.
translation.zh: 她没做扫描 他们把她带去别处了

translation.en: I don't know. You're the detective, you figure it out.
translation.zh: 我不知道 负责破案的是你们 别问我

translation.en: I just know that there's something wrong with this place.
translation.zh: 我只知道这个地方事有蹊跷

translation.en: Dr. Berthram, who was attending this morning,
translation.zh: 今早值班的伯瑟拉姆医生

translation.en: Good. Maybe he can clear all this up.
translation.zh: 那就好 也许他能解释清楚情况
美女 你叫什么名字？ 安妮
安妮 你一天轮两班吗？

translation.en: Single gal's gotta make a living.
translation.zh: 单身的姑娘得养活自己啊

translation.en: [officer 2] You ever sleep? What time you get off tonight?
translation.zh: 你不睡觉吗？你今晚什么时候下班？

translation.en: [officer 1] Okay, well, this is him. Ray Monroe.
translation.zh: 好的 他就在那儿 雷门罗

translation.en: Found this in the trash out front. It's the morning sign-in list.
translation.zh: 这是在垃圾桶里翻到的 是上午的登记表

translation.en: [sighs] Here's my name. There's my name.

translation.zh: 雷 这是你自己的名字

translation.en: -I signed in for Peri. -No, you signed in for yourself.
translation.zh: 我帮佩莉登的记 你是给自己登的记
到底怎么回事 亚伦？

translation.en: Anne said something about missing patients.
translation.zh: 听安妮说 有患者失踪了？

translation.en: -You know me, right? Remember? -All right, back off.
All right? You saw my little girl, all right?
translation.zh: 你诊治了我的女儿 对吧？

translation.en: You-- You treated her arm. You-- You--
translation.zh: 你治疗了她的手臂 你记得吗？

translation.en: -[officer 1] Do you remember this man? -[Ray] Tell 'em!
translation.zh: 你记得他吗？ 说话啊！

translation.en: I do. He was here earlier today.
translation.zh: 我记得 他今天稍早时来过

translation.en: [Lucado] We have been all through this--
He was a walk-in, and one of our doctors, Bruce Volk,
translation.zh: 他没有提前预约 我们的布鲁斯沃尔克医生

translation.en: He told Anne that he had been in a car accident.
translation.zh: 他告诉安妮他出了车祸
他的行为举止看上去相当不稳定

translation.en: Dr. Volk asked me to take a look.
translation.zh: 沃尔克医生便让我来瞧一瞧

translation.en: So I suggested maybe doing a head CT, which he refused.
translation.zh: 于是我建议做头部断层扫描 但他拒绝了

translation.en: He insisted on going back out to the lobby to wait for his wife.
translation.zh: 他执意要回到大厅去等他的妻子
她叫什么名字来着？ 艾比

translation.en: Thought you said your wife's name was Joanne.
translation.zh: 你不是说你妻子叫乔安妮吗？

translation.en: She had nothing to do with Joanne and Peri.
translation.zh: 她与乔安妮和佩莉无关

translation.en: Who he claims is his current wife and child.
translation.zh: 据他说是他的妻子和孩子

translation.en: This is Joanne, and this is Peri.
translation.zh: 这是乔安妮 这是佩莉

translation.en: Periwinkle. You remember? Because that's Joanne's favorite shell.
translation.zh: 佩莉温可 你记得吗？ 因为玉黍螺是乔安妮最爱的海螺

translation.en: And that's my family, and I love them.
translation.zh: 她们是我的家人 我爱她们

translation.en: [officer 1] What does your first wife have to do
translation.zh: 你的第一任妻子和这些有什么关系？
你的第一任妻子和这些有什么关系？ 没有关系

translation.en: You got Abby's name from the insurance information, right?
translation.zh: 你是从保险信息上看到的艾比吧？

translation.en: And you're just using it against me to make me look crazy,
translation.zh: 你在利用这个名字制造我发疯的假象

translation.en: you've kidnapped my family, and you've done something to 'em.
translation.zh: 你绑架了我的家人 还行为不轨

translation.en: Okay, there's a simple enough way to confirm or deny
translation.zh: 有一个想当简单的方法 能证明或推翻这个家伙的屁话
能证明或推翻这个家伙的屁话

translation.en: This is today's waiting room feed.
translation.zh: 这是今天等候室的录像

translation.en: What time did you say you came in with your family?
translation.zh: 你说你和家人是什么时候来的？

translation.en: Work our way forward from there until we see you.
translation.zh: 然后一路快进 直到出现你的身影

translation.en: Okay, this is me coming in,
and Joanne was carrying Peri behind me.
translation.zh: 乔安妮抱着佩莉在我后面

translation.en: All right, there I am. Right.
This is where she said wait. Um, I went back to the seating area.
translation.zh: 这时她叫我等着 于是我就回去坐着了

translation.en: [officer 1] What are those? Those little glitches?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？画面怎么一闪一闪的？

translation.en: Records 30 seconds out of every minute, so there's gonna be gaps.
translation.zh: 每分钟只拍下30秒 所以会有间隙

translation.en: -[officer 1] Well, where's your family? -[Ray] They're right there. Just--
translation.zh: 那你的家人在哪儿呢？ 她们就在那儿 那个…

translation.en: Can you-- They're under the camera.
translation.zh: 你能不能…她们在镜头下方

translation.en: You can't see where they're sitting 'cause of the chairs.
translation.zh: 她们坐的地方被椅子挡住了

translation.en: The ones you see are the ones that are workin' out there.
translation.zh: 这就是摄像头拍到的全部画面了

translation.en: All right, there I am coming back. That's after Peri went for the CAT scan.
translation.zh: 好 这时我回来了 佩莉已经去做断层扫描了

translation.en: [Jeff] Yeah. Never saw you go in with 'em, though.
translation.zh: 问题是 没有你和她们一起的画面
你们的安保系统烂死了

translation.en: You've got nothing of my family going in.
translation.zh: 完全没拍到我的家人进去
失陪一下 真是烂爆了！

translation.en: Do you have any footage from inside the ER?
translation.zh: 你有急诊室内部的录像吗？

translation.en: [Lucado] We don't record in the treatment areas.
translation.zh: 我们不对治疗区域进行摄像
出于法律原因 病人隐私

translation.en: Check the hallways. Check the hallways. Check 'em, all right?
translation.zh: 检查一下过道 快 你们走廊的摄像头最好有好角度

translation.en: You have better camera placement in the hall.
translation.zh: 快 你们走廊的摄像头最好有好角度

translation.en: We're gonna be here all fuckin' night.
translation.zh: 今晚都别他妈想回家了

translation.en: -[Ray] Search the hospital! -[officer 1] Okay, that's not happening.
translation.zh: 搜查医院！ 行了 这不可能

translation.en: First, we would need a warrant. Then we would need probable cause,
translation.zh: 首先我们要有搜查令 还要有合理根据

translation.en: and there's nothing on that video that proves anyone is even missing.
translation.zh: 录像里连有人失踪这点都无法证明

translation.en: You think that I'm faking? You think I'm making them up?
translation.zh: 你觉得我在假装吗？ 你觉得我在胡编乱造吗？

translation.en: I mean, the person you keep talking about is Abby.
translation.zh: 毕竟你一直说起的人是艾比

translation.en: I don't keep talking about Abby. You keep talking about Abby.
translation.zh: 我才没有一直说艾比呢 是你们一直在说艾比

translation.en: Come on. Come on, Ray. You got this.
translation.zh: 快想办法啊 给点力啊 雷 你能行的

translation.en: The cashier at the service station where Peri fell,
translation.zh: 佩莉出事的那个服务站的收银员

translation.en: There's a Gas and Go, it's a couple of miles from here. Ask her.
translation.zh: 那儿有个急速加油站 离这儿几公里 你们去问她

translation.en: -I'll see if I can track her down. -[Ray] Thank you.
translation.zh: 我去看看能不能找到她

translation.en: I think we found someone back in the ward that can help us clear everything up.
translation.zh: 我想我们在病房里 找到了一个可以帮我们厘清一切的人

translation.en: It must've dropped out when we were here this morning.
translation.zh: 一定是我们上午来这儿的时候落下了

translation.en: Can you prove it in some way?
-I mean, is her name on the tag? -It's hers!
translation.zh: -上面有挂她的名字吗？ -这就是她的！
有发票吗？ 这就是她的

translation.en: It's my blood from my head when we fell into the pit.
translation.zh: 这是我们掉坑里时 我头上流出的血
是这样 对头部损伤患者来说

translation.en: it's not uncommon to be confused or to mix things up,
translation.zh: 神志不清或混淆事实的情况并不少见

translation.en: Why would I have my daughter's scarf and not her?
translation.zh: 要是我女儿不在这儿 又怎么会有她的围巾？

translation.en: 'cause she had it in the car when we were coming back from Thanksgiving,
translation.zh: 我们过完感恩节回家时 她在车里还戴着它

translation.en: and she wanted some batteries, so we stopped in a service station.
translation.zh: 她想要新电池 我们就在服务站停了下来

translation.en: She fell, she went in the hole, and I fell in on top of her,
translation.zh: 她摔下了坑里 我落在了她身上

translation.en: and that's where she got the blood.
And then we came here because she had a broken arm, and she--
translation.zh: 我们过来是因为她手臂骨折了 然后她…
你给我们看了病 然后…

translation.en: Stop! Get your shit together, man, or you going to jail!
translation.zh: 别说了！ 你他妈给我振作点 不然你会吃牢饭 听明白了吗？
不然你会吃牢饭 听明白了吗？
你听明白了吗？给我振作点
我是特蕾莎雅各布斯医生

translation.en: I work in the psychiatric department for the county.
translation.zh: 我在郡上的精神科工作
我更倾向于被称作“医疗顾问”

translation.en: No one is saying that you are.
I'd like to help you find out what happened to Joanne and Peri.
translation.zh: 我想帮你弄清楚乔安妮和佩莉怎么了

translation.en: We're as concerned about them as you are.
translation.zh: 我们和你一样担心她们

translation.en: -I doubt that. -You should think about listening, man.
translation.zh: 我不相信 你应该多听听别人的话 伙计

translation.en: Officer, thank you. I can handle this now.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 警官 让我来接手吧

translation.en: You want to come somewhere more private and talk about this?
translation.zh: 你想找个更私密的地方聊聊吗？

translation.en: So, I thought you might be happy to know
translation.zh: 我想这个消息可能会令你开心

translation.en: It's, um, your file, Ray, not your daughter's.
translation.zh: 这是你的档案 雷 而不是你女儿的

translation.en: There's no mention of Peri in here.
[sniffles] No, it's just bullshit that they just made up.
translation.zh: 不 这就是他们瞎编的狗屁罢了

translation.en: I was hoping you could talk a bit about what happened
translation.zh: 我想请你讲一下 在车祸之前发生了什么事
在车祸之前发生了什么事

translation.en: She fell at a construction site.
translation.zh: 她在一个建筑工地摔了下去

translation.en: Okay, sorry, I only know what's in here.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我只知道档案里的内容

translation.en: Maybe you could tell me what you remember.
translation.zh: 或许你可以告诉我你记得的事

translation.en: I remember everything. Don't treat me like I'm crazy.
translation.zh: 我什么都记得 不要把我当疯子对待

translation.en: [Jacobs] I am treating you as a rational human being, Ray.
translation.zh: 我是把你当成一个理性的人对待 雷

translation.en: Right now, all I've got to go on is your word that they were here at all.
translation.zh: 目前 她们来过的唯一证据 只是你的一面之词

translation.en: This proves that they were here...
and that they are hiding them.
That your wife and little girl came in at random for treatment?
translation.zh: 碰巧过来看病的你的妻子和女儿？

translation.en: Oh, you work here, you tell me.
translation.zh: 你是这里的员工 你比我清楚

translation.en: It's not got anything to do with Abby.
translation.zh: 这和艾比一点关系都没有
她死了？ 对 八年前

translation.en: Why don't you tell me what happened?
translation.zh: 跟我说说她是怎么死的

translation.en: [stammers] She-- It was a head-on collision.
translation.zh: 她… 那是一场迎面相撞事故

translation.en: This has nothing to do with this...
translation.zh: 那件事和当下的问题无关

translation.en: In the file, you mentioned a drinking problem.
translation.zh: 在档案里 你提到过酗酒的问题
雷 车祸发生的时候

translation.en: were you too drunk to help Abby?
translation.zh: 你已经醉到无法救出艾比了吗？

translation.en: Have you ever had blackouts, Ray?
translation.zh: 雷 你有喝到不省人事过吗？

translation.en: I don't drink. I don't drink anymore.
translation.zh: 我不喝酒 我再也没喝过酒了

translation.en: -I haven't had a drink in eight years. -[Jacobs] Why...
translation.zh: 八年来 我滴酒未沾

translation.en: did you tell the staff that you were waiting for Abby, Ray?
translation.zh: 那你为什么对医院的人说 你在等艾比 雷？

translation.en: [sobbing] Abby died in a car accident eight years ago,
translation.zh: 艾比在八年前的车祸中死了
每一天都如此 简直就是…

translation.en: and it's gonna be hard to hear.
But you have to listen, Ray,
translation.zh: 但你一定要听我说 雷

translation.en: I believe something happened to Peri and Joanne...
translation.zh: 我认为佩莉和乔安妮出事了

translation.en: I think we should take a look at the spot
translation.zh: 我觉得我们应该去看看
为什么？那里什么都没有

translation.en: [Jacobs] I think it's a good idea, Ray.
translation.zh: 我觉得这样会比较好 雷

translation.en: If you'll excuse me for a moment, hmm?
[Jacobs] He's obviously experiencing some deep trauma.
translation.zh: 他显然遭受了很深的创伤

translation.en: I suggest going back to the place he claims his daughter was hurt.
translation.zh: 我建议回到他声称他女儿受伤的地方

translation.en: They might still be out there.
I'll, uh, put a call into the canine unit and see if they can meet us
translation.zh: 我这就去跟警犬队联系 看他们能否在加油站与我们会合
看他们能否在加油站与我们会合

translation.en: but I've got dispatch trying to track down the cashier.
translation.zh: 不过我已经派人去找收银员了

translation.en: Um, it might be good for us if you come along.
translation.zh: 你和我们一起去可能比较好
没问题 她们不在那儿

translation.en: Maybe you're all in on this, or maybe you're not.
translation.zh: 也许你们全部是一伙的 也许不是

translation.en: The fact is, my wife and daughter went down a hallway in this hospital
translation.zh: 事实是 我的妻子和女儿 走进了这家医院的走廊

translation.en: [officer 3] No problem. What have you got?
translation.zh: 应该的 现在是什么情况？

translation.en: [officer 1] Two missing persons, a woman and child.
translation.zh: 有两名人员失踪 一个女人一个孩子

translation.en: Ray, where did your daughter fall?
translation.zh: 雷 你女儿是从哪儿摔下去的？

translation.en: [officer 3] Got a scent source for Mandy?
Can I see that scarf, Ray?
translation.zh: 雷 能把那条围巾给我吗？

translation.en: The only thing that dog's gonna smell is that we were here earlier.
translation.zh: 那条狗只会闻到我们之前来过这里

translation.en: We have to start somewhere, Ray.
translation.zh: 我们总得做点什么 雷
雷 这里发生了什么事？ 什么事也没有

translation.en: Just, Peri lost a compact, you know? This tiny toy mirror,
translation.zh: 就是佩莉把她的小镜盒弄丢了 就是个玩具小镜子

translation.en: me and Jo, we looked for it.
She looked in the bathroom, I looked in the car, and then...
translation.zh: 她检查了洗手间 我检查了车里

translation.en: and I lost sight of her for a second.
translation.zh: 我有一下子没有看好她

translation.en: And I look up, and there's this dog growlin' at her,
translation.zh: 我往前一看 有只狗正朝她大叫
她被吓到了 就摔了下去

translation.en: [officer 3] Here we go. I think she's got something.
translation.zh: 好的 看来它有发现

translation.en: [Ray] Let me see it. Let me see it. Please.
Please. Just give that to me. It's Peri's. That's what Peri lost.
translation.zh: 求你把它给我 这是佩莉的 是她掉的东西
求你了 那是佩莉的小镜盒

translation.en: Must have just been in her pocket the whole time,
translation.zh: 这东西肯定一直在她口袋里

translation.en: and it just fell out when she fell. [chuckles, sighs]
translation.zh: 在她摔下去的时候掉出来了

translation.en: [officer 2] And the blood? That's your daughter's blood?
translation.zh: 那这滩血迹呢？ 是你女儿的血吗？

translation.en: It's my blood. I hit my head.
translation.zh: 是我的血 我撞到头了

translation.en: -Oh, it's yours? You hit your head. -[Ray] Yeah.
translation.zh: -是你的血 你撞到头了 -对

translation.en: That's my blood. I hit my head, man, look at--
translation.zh: 这就是我的血 我撞到头了 你看

translation.en: -Look! Look at it! -Get the fuck off me, you crazy fuck!
translation.zh: 快看啊 你他妈给我滚开 死疯子！

translation.en: This is a crime scene now.
translation.zh: 现在这里是犯罪现场了

translation.en: -Go call the CSI unit. -Fuckin' nuts, man.
translation.zh: 去呼叫犯罪现场调查组 你他妈就是个疯子

translation.en: [officer 1] Keep on looking. There might be more.
translation.zh: 继续找 可能还有线索

translation.en: He planted it. He planted the mirror!
translation.zh: 他这是栽赃我 镜子是他放的

translation.en: Did he plant the blood too?
-Really? -Officer. Just give us a second here.
translation.zh: -是吗？ -警官 麻烦回避一下

translation.en: You gotta help me. You see what's happening here?
translation.zh: 你得帮帮我 你也看到了吧？

translation.en: -You gotta help me. -[Jacobs] I am trying to help you, Ray.
Now, I asked you once before. Let me ask you again...
translation.zh: 这个问题我已经问过了 我再问一次
在出事之前发生了什么？
你有在为什么事心烦吗？
也许是你女儿惹你生气了？

translation.en: I had a fight with my wife about my marriage.
translation.zh: 我和妻子正在为感情的事情吵架

translation.en: So, I know that she's not happy.
I know that she just wants me to try harder. And I do try hard!
translation.zh: 她想让我更上心一些 我确实有尽力了

translation.en: I told Peri, "Just stay there." Right? "Just stay right there."
translation.zh: 我对佩莉说：“你就待在那儿 你就待着不要乱动”

translation.en: And she didn't listen, and she should have listened!
translation.zh: 可她偏不听 她应该听我的话的

translation.en: So you were angry with her.
translation.zh: 所以你当时在生她的气

translation.en: Yeah, I was angry. I picked up a rock, and I threw it.
translation.zh: 我是生气 我捡起石头扔了出去

translation.en: I tried really hard to-- to-- to- to grab her.
translation.zh: 我很努力地想要抓住她

translation.en: are you sure there was a dog?
[Jacobs] There was no dog, was there, Ray?
translation.zh: 当时根本没有狗 对吧 雷？
这就是事情的全部经过了

translation.en: You were upset at your daughter,
So you picked up a rock.
translation.zh: 于是 你捡起一块石头

translation.en: you were so angry at yourself at what you'd done...
translation.zh: 你对自己的所作所为愤怒万分

translation.en: That's what happened, isn't it, Ray?
translation.zh: 这才是事情的经过吧 雷？
你有受伤吗？ 雷 人的大脑

translation.en: it can sometimes create an alternate reality, a false reality,
translation.zh: 有时会创造出另一种现实 一种虚假的现实

translation.en: -[Peri screams] -[Jacobs] From the things we fear,
from the horrors we can't even imagine.
translation.zh: 免受我们根本无法想象的恐怖

translation.en: [Jacobs] You lost your family once before,
translation.zh: 你已经失去过一次家人

translation.en: and when you saw what you'd done to Peri...
translation.zh: 当你看到自己的所作所为 先是对佩莉

translation.en: your mind couldn't accept the fact that it had happened all over again.
translation.zh: 你的大脑 无法接受这样的事再度发生了

translation.en: I would never hurt you, sweetie.
translation.zh: 我绝对不会伤害你 乖乖

translation.en: Mr. Monroe, you are under arrest for the suspicion of murder.
translation.zh: 门罗先生 你因涉嫌谋杀而被逮捕

translation.en: -You have the right to remain silent. -[Mandy barking]
Anything you say can and will be used against you in a court of law.
translation.zh: 你所说的每一句话都将成为呈堂证供

translation.en: You have the right to an attorney. If you can not afford an attorney,
translation.zh: 你有权请律师 如果你无法负担律师…

translation.en: It's going to be okay. I'm just gonna scare him.
translation.zh: 不会有事的 我就是吓唬一下它

translation.en: Put it down. Put it down. Put down all your guns.
translation.zh: 把枪放下 你们都把枪放下

translation.en: Put down your guns and your radios and kick 'em away.
translation.zh: 把你们的枪和对讲机都放下 踢到一边去

translation.en: -You too! -You know you're fucking yourself, right?
translation.zh: 你们也是！ 你他妈这是在胡闹 你知道吗？
你们就待在上面 对
听好了 全部人都给我上去 快走！

translation.en: You go, get out! Go on, go up!
[Jacobs] I know you won't hurt me, Ray.
translation.zh: 我知道你不会伤害我 雷

translation.en: You think that I've murdered my wife and my daughter.
translation.zh: 你认为我谋杀了我的妻子和女儿

translation.en: So who are you to me?
translation.zh: 你觉得我会把你当回事吗？
好 顺着边上拐过去

translation.en: All right, now get in. Everyone in.
translation.zh: 好 进去 全部都进去

translation.en: if you thought seeing that dog
somehow makes everything else you believe true,
translation.zh: 让你觉得你所认为的一切都是真的
这是个错误 我们走着瞧

translation.en: [officer 2] You motherfucker! You motherfucker! You're so fucked!
translation.zh: 你他妈的混账东西！你他妈完蛋了！

translation.en: -[man] Still seeing Phil from radiology? -[woman] I don't think so.
translation.zh: 你还在和放射科的菲尔约会吗？ 没有了

translation.en: I mean, I'm afraid to even pick mine up, you know?
translation.zh: 我都不敢把我的孩子抱起来
这是你的第一个孩子吗？
很遗憾 门罗先生 她死了
没救了 宣布死亡吧

translation.en: I'm sorry, Mr. Monroe. They're gone.
translation.zh: 很遗憾 门罗先生 她们死了

translation.en: I just want to get my family... and I want to go home.
translation.zh: 我就是想找回我的家人 我想回家

translation.en: Just point the barrel away. All right?
translation.zh: 别把枪口对着我 好吗？

translation.en: I'll take you to your family, all right?
translation.zh: 我带你去见你的家人 好吗？

translation.en: [under breath] Give me... Give me the keys.
[low battery toy] I hope you feel better.
[Anne] EMS just brought in a couple head traumas.
translation.zh: 救护车刚送来两个头部受创患者
迎面相撞 司机酒驾了

translation.en: [Berthram] The most beautiful eyes I've ever seen.
translation.zh: 这是我见过的最美的眼睛

translation.en: [clerk] Would you like Peri listed for organ donation?
translation.zh: 你希望佩莉被列入器官捐献名单吗？

translation.en: Can I convince you to reconsider?
translation.zh: 我能说服你重新考虑吗？

translation.en: Don't touch her! Get back! Away from the table.
translation.zh: 不许碰她！ 后退 离手术台远点！把东西放下！

translation.en: Put that down! Put it down! Back against the wall! Peri...
translation.zh: 后退 离手术台远点！把东西放下！ 背靠墙面！ 佩莉
佩莉？ 站在那儿别动

translation.en: Don't worry, baby. I got you, baby.
translation.zh: 别担心 我来了 宝贝

translation.en: [Lucado] You don't need to do this.
You think you can cut up my family?
translation.zh: 你们竟然想对我的家人动刀？

translation.en: You think you can just cut up my little girl?
translation.zh: 你们竟然想对我女儿动刀？
雷 你完全神志不清了
雷 别这样 求你了

translation.en: I know. Hold on to Peri.
translation.zh: 我知道 你把佩莉抱好

translation.en: -I got you. I got you. -[elevator bell dings]
-Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa. Stop! Stop! Stop! -Whoa, whoa!
Just get out of my way.
Mr. Monroe, listen to me. You gotta listen to me.
translation.zh: 门罗先生 你听我说 你一定要听我说

translation.en: We can't let you leave. You can't leave here.
translation.zh: 我们不能让你们离开 你们不能走

translation.en: I'm Dr. Bruce Volk. Do you remember?
translation.zh: 我是布鲁斯沃尔克医生 你记得吗？

translation.en: Look, we just want to help you. Why don't you just put the gun down--
translation.zh: 我们只是想帮你而已 不如你先… 把枪放下
这个给你 注意保暖

translation.en: [Peri] My arm, Daddy, it still hurts.
translation.zh: 爹地 我的手臂还疼着呢

translation.en: Well, how about a song, will that make you feel better?
translation.zh: 唱歌怎么样？那样能让你好受些吗？

translation.en: ♪ Red and yellow and pink and green ♪
translation.zh: 红色 黄色 粉色 绿色

translation.en: I got you. I got you.
[Bruce] Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa! Stop!

translation.zh: 雷 你完全神志不清了
有时会创造出另一种现实

translation.en: From the horrors we can't imagine.
translation.zh: 免受我们根本无法想象的恐怖

translation.en: She's okay. She's okay. She's okay!
-[Peri] Where's Daddy? -[Jo sobbing] She's okay. She's okay.
